title: Slap Hand
summaries: The Slap Hand is a Hardmode melee weapon that is notable for having extremely high knockback â€“ a rating of 20, one of the highest values among all player-caused sources of knockback. Aside from this, it functions as a normal broadsword, swung over the player's head.
On Desktop, Console, and Mobile versions, it makes a unique sound when hitting an enemy with it
It is purchased from the Skeleton Merchant for 25 during a Hardmode Blood Moon.

statistics.Damage: 55 / 35 (Melee)
statistics.Use time: 20 (Very fast) / 21 (Fast)
statistics.Buy: 25
statistics.Sell: 5
